#id=1
#text=Friday was Madison 's birthday party and I wanted to make sure that I looked my best .
#id=2
#text=I asked my dad to take me to the local barber shop .
#id=3
#text=When I got there , I sat down and saw that there were two other people waiting .
#id=4
#text=I decided to go over to the magazine rack and I found a magazine about baseball .
#id=5
#text=I really enjoyed all of the stories that were in the magazine .
#id=6
#text=Before I knew it , the barber called me over to the chair .
#id=7
#text=I sat down and then he asked me what kind of haircut I wanted .
#id=8
#text=It was summer so I decided to get a crew cut .
#id=9
#text=He started off by using the electric razor on my head .
#text=After that , he got out the scissors in order to cut some of the remaining hair .
#text=After he finished , he put some powder on my face and brushed off any hair that had fallen .
#text=He showed me the haircut in a mirror and I was pleased .
